title: Balloons and spinifex
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Shan Benson, Ian Dunlop and John Gray
brief_description: The building of a weather station in the Australian desert, showing the work of those who run it and the use made of their reports by the Bureau of Meteorology. Based at the Giles Weather Station.
